1. Bosch GLM 50 C Laser Measure: This device offers a 165ft range with ±1/16" accuracy, Bluetooth, an inclinometer, and color display. It's compact and app-connected, making it ideal for professional use and real-time measurement.

7. Stanley 100’ Laser Distance Measurer: Providing accurate readings within ±2mm, it supports continuous measurement plus add/subtract functions. It's suitable for solo measuring tasks in construction or interior planning.
